description: The graphics in trays can be imported into CorelDRAW or Corel PHOTO-PAINT.

NOTE: Corel CONNECT creates one TRAY file per user tray in the [user]\​Documents\​Corel\​Corel Conten\​Trays\​ directory. The user does not manually save TRAY files, but you can open a shared tray by choosing the "Open tray file..." option from the tray panel.
